plugin.author: emerchantpay Ltd.
plugin.description:
Payment Module for Shopware 5, that gives you the ability to process payments through emerchantpay's Payment Gateway - Genesis.


Contains Following Payment Methods:

  • emerchantpay Checkout
  • emerchantpay Direct


Contact us:  tech-support@emerchantpay.com
Website:  www.emerchantpay.com
